name: Pipelines
description:
Pipelines is a game about a subterranean quest of Penny, who travels through pipelines to reach the goal. The theme of the GMTK Jam in 2019 is ‘only one...’, so we decided to use the theme of ‘only one button’ in our project. 

To substitute movement, a pointer rotates around penny, and when the player selects the SPACE key they enter the corresponding pipe. The pointer increases speed until Penny is too dizzy, and the player dies.

Please play the game and critique it in the comments, we hope you enjoy!
